医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员展示了一种对抗胰腺癌的新方法马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校和麻省大学陈医学院的研究人员在小鼠身上展示了一种对抗胰腺癌的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Researchers-demonstrate-a-new-method-to-combat-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Researchers-demonstrate-a-new-method-to-combat-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39db0b05-2f15-4ba5-bdb3-7d49ddf80557 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 15:40:39 -0400 Researchers demonstrate a new method to combat pancreatic cancer
不健康商品与心理健康问题有关烟草、酒精、超加工食品、社交媒体和化石燃料等“不健康商品”，以及气候变化和空气污染等化石燃料消耗的影响与抑郁、自杀和自残有关。伦敦卫生与热带医学学院的 Kate Dun-Campbell 及其同事于 8 月 28 日发表的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Unhealthy-commodities-linked-to-mental-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Unhealthy-commodities-linked-to-mental-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07d2079a-d911-4e48-bc70-8bf0751c48a3 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 15:37:00 -0400 Unhealthy commodities linked to mental health problems
新型生物医学设备为慢性疼痛患者带来希望疼痛是一种必要的生物信号，但多种情况可能会导致这些信号出错。对于患有慢性疼痛的人来说，根源往往是大脑深处出现的错误信号，对已经愈合的伤口、已经截肢的肢体或其他复杂、难以解释的情况发出错误警报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-biomedical-device-offers-hope-for-病人-with-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/New-biomedical-device-offers-hope-for-病人-with-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a3d42cf-46fe-4200-be8d-ce0ee8598503 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 15:32:42 -0400 New biomedical device offers hope for patients with chronic pain
初级保健提供者是解决情绪化饮食问题的关键哈佛医学院和马萨诸塞州剑桥健康联盟的 Jana DeSimone Wozniak 博士和医学博士、公共卫生硕士黄翔指出，由于初级保健提供者与患者的长期关系，初级保健提供者能够很好地解决情绪化饮食问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Primary-care-providers-key-to-addressing-emotional-eating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Primary-care-providers-key-to-addressing-emotional-eating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f70b3992-0602-4790-bb08-2f6d7d20c578 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 15:25:00 -0400 Primary care providers key to addressing emotional eating
突破性疫苗针对牛蜱传牛无形体病密苏里大学的研究人员正在努力开发有史以来第一种疫苗，经证明可以保护牛免受一种毁灭性的蜱传牛病（称为牛无形体病）的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Breakthrough-vaccine-targets-tick-borne-bovine-anaplasmosis-in-cattle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Breakthrough-vaccine-targets-tick-borne-bovine-anaplasmosis-in-cattle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4597e7b-dbff-45eb-8e5f-d210f1ff5efe Wed, 28 Aug 2024 15:20:32 -0400 Breakthrough vaccine targets tick-borne bovine anaplasmosis in cattle
遗传性心脏淀粉样变性在英国比以前想象的更常见伦敦大学学院和伦敦玛丽女王大学研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，英国面临遗传性心脏淀粉样变性（一种可能致命的心脏病）风险的人比之前想象的要多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Hereditary-cardiac-amyloidosis-more-common-in-the-UK-than-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Hereditary-cardiac-amyloidosis-more-common-in-the-UK-than-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91b80a7b-592a-472c-b6e6-9a004db5d938 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 15:13:44 -0400 Hereditary cardiac amyloidosis more common in the UK than previously thought
研究揭示女性使用合成代谢雄激素类固醇的挑战和风险发表在《药物和酒精评论》上的一项新研究揭示了对使用合成代谢雄激素类固醇 (AAS) 的女性所面临的挑战和风险的重要见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-reveals-challenges-and-risks-for-women-using-anabolic-androgenic-steroids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Study-reveals-challenges-and-risks-for-women-using-anabolic-androgenic-steroids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d08d5e78-0da0-4202-bbd4-d11caf827a9f Wed, 28 Aug 2024 14:59:36 -0400 Study reveals challenges and risks for women using anabolic-androgenic steroids
通过切断必需营养素和备用供应来瞄准癌细胞癌细胞有贪婪的胃口。并且有某些营养物质是它们无法生存的。科学家们长期以来一直希望通过切断癌细胞饮食的一个重要部分来阻止肿瘤的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Targeting-cancer-cells-by-cutting-off-essential-nutritions-and-backup-supplies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Targeting-cancer-cells-by-cutting-off-essential-nutritions-and-backup-supplies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f7ec835-b6cc-4887-8bad-d55983543d57 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 14:54:26 -0400 Targeting cancer cells by cutting off essential nutrients and backup supplies
2 型糖尿病和糖尿病前期与大脑加速老化有关瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院在《糖尿病护理》杂志上发表的一项新研究表明，2 型糖尿病和前驱糖尿病与大脑加速老化有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Type-2-diabetes-and-prediabetes-linked-to-accelerated-brain-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/Type-2-diabetes-and-prediabetes-linked-to-accelerated-brain-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85b7bd9e-8721-40aa-8fd8-6b5e934e7cf0 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 14:49:51 -0400 Type 2 diabetes and prediabetes linked to accelerated brain aging
感知的好处和风险如何影响公众支付医疗费用的意愿医疗保健无疑对每个人都至关重要。随着个人年龄的增长，健康问题和相关费用的风险也会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/How-perceived-benefits-and-risks-affect-public-willingness-to-pay-for-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240828/How-perceived-benefits-and-risks-affect-public-willingness-to-pay-for-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d13dd039-d92f-4566-af32-77ae9e90bc21 Wed, 28 Aug 2024 14:45:16 -0400 How perceived benefits and risks affect public willingness to pay for healthcare
